author: robbie
msg: QPID-4390, QPID-4743: configuration improvements from review
- Rename the embedded initial config file to initial-config.json
- Ensure the default vhost store path is unique by including its type and vhost name.
- Rename ports to remove the port number.
- Stop shipping unused virtualhosts.xml in example config to reduce confusion
